resources.string: Enable the app to use your mobile data to download articles in the background.
Automatically update the articles in the background.
Schedule update at a specific time
Allow the Evening Mail to send you notifications when new articles are downloaded
Send anonymous data to help improve the app. For more details see our Privacy policy.
Clearing the cache will remove all articles from your device.
